books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.synopsis: A young girl named Scout navigates the prejudices and racism of the American South while her father, lawyer Atticus Finch, defends a falsely accused black man.

books.author: George Orwell
books.genre: Dystopian, Political Fiction, Social Science Fiction
books.synopsis: In a future totalitarian society, Winston Smith, who works in the Ministry of Truth, begins to rebel against the oppressive government that watches every aspect of its citizens' lives.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.synopsis: Elizabeth Bennet navigates issues of manners, upbringing, morality, education, and marriage in the society of the landed gentry of early 19th-century England.
